mapper.insert: INSERT INTO data_package (key, doi, title, description, license, created, modified, created_by, modified_by, checksum, size, published_in, share_in) VALUES(#{key, jdbcType=OTHER, typeHandler=UuidTypeHandler}, #{doi, jdbcType=OTHER, typeHandler=DoiTypeHandler}, #{title, jdbcType=OTHER}, #{description, jdbcType=OTHER}, #{license, jdbcType=OTHER}, #{created, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}now(), #{modified, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}now(), #{createdBy, jdbcType=OTHER}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{checksum,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{size,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{publishedIn,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{shareIn,jdbcType=OTHER,typeHandler=TextArrayToSetTypeHandler})
mapper.update: UPDATE data_package SET title = #{title, jdbcType=OTHER}, description = #{description, jdbcType=OTHER}, license = #{license, jdbcType=OTHER}, modified = #{modified, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}now(), modified_by = #{createdBy, jdbcType=OTHER}, checksum = #{checksum, jdbcType=OTHER}, size = #{size, jdbcType=OTHER}, share_in = #{shareIn, jdbcType=OTHER, typeHandler=TextArrayToSetTypeHandler} WHERE key = #{key, jdbcType=OTHER}
mapper.delete: UPDATE data_package SET deleted = now() WHERE key = #{dataPackageKey, jdbcType=OTHER} AND deleted IS NULL
